text: Aluf Dan Tolkowsky (or Tolkovsky, ; born January 17, 1921) is a retired Israeli military officer. He was commander of the Israeli Air Force from 1953 to 1958. He was born in Tel Aviv. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jews from Palestine are sent to the RAF pilot course in Rhodesia, IAF Official Site. Accessed June 9, 2006. Category:1921 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from Tel Aviv Category:Aviators
title: Dan Tolkowsky
